record.id: field.name="contexttag" and file.name="kmquery" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: contexttag
record.file.name: kmquery

brief.brief: The source field value used to track search activity.
The Knowledge Management Integration Mapping function enables you to map fields in a Service Manager table to fields in another Service Manager table.
This allows users to search, retrieve, and author documents more efficiently so that data is shared between operations.

Within these record mappings, the Source Field column specifies the field in Service Manager that is sent to the Knowledge Management Target Field. The "contextTag" is this source field value, which is used to track all search activity in the kmsearchhistory and the kmusagehistory table.
